text: “If someone acts unfaithfully and sins unintentionally against any of the LORD’s holy things, he must bring his guilt offering to the LORD: an unblemished ram from the flock, of proper value 5:15 Or flock or its equivalence in silver shekels according to the sanctuary shekel;5:15 A shekel is approximately 0.4 ounces or 11.4 grams of silver. it is a guilt offering.
